channel.title: ShadowX V9.4 -
channel.description:
[center]REP+ is Appreciated [size=36pt]RELEASING SOON 9.5 !~!~!~!~!~!~!~!~!~!~!~!~ [/size] [b]Well i do realise many people have been recommending the MTP version of PI Base there fore ii am releasing my source based on MTP with modifications to it. Hope to see this get released soon.[/b]
[center][b][size=16pt]ShadowX![/size][/b][/center] [center][b][size=14pt]The Ultimate Gaming Experience.[/size][/b][/center]
[img]http://i29.tinypic.com/300eekp.png[/img][url=http://uppit.com/43tp5xs80dr8/Source.zip]Download Source[/url] [img]http://i29.tinypic.com/300eekp.png[/img][url=http://uppit.com/wjv29usjk51f/ShadowX_Client_V1.zip]Download Client[/url] [b]Client IP is Currently set to 64.186.133.186 be sure to change that to your no-ip.[/b]
[b][size=10pt]Server Features![/size][/b] [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2rfpyqt.gif"[/img]Perfect Chaotics! [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2rfpyqt.gif"[/img]474 Turmoil! [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2rfpyqt.gif"[/img]Dragon Claw Special Working - Perfect Hits! [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2rfpyqt.gif"[/img]Perfect Hybridding! [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2rfpyqt.gif"[/img]Good ingame Graphics! All monsters fully animated! [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2rfpyqt.gif"[/img]All Special Attacks Coded! [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2rfpyqt.gif"[/img]Correct 474 Godsword Stance! [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2rfpyqt.gif"[/img]Ancients, Lunar and Regular Magic! [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2rfpyqt.gif"[/img]Multiple PK Spots! [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2rfpyqt.gif"[/img]100% Dueling and Staking! [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2rfpyqt.gif"[/img]Events hosted by administrators.. [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2rfpyqt.gif"[/img]Staff in need! [img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2rfpyqt.gif"[/img]Fun mini-games!
[b]More features will be added![/b]
Pictures: [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/125rpk7.jpg[/img] [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/ej8z5.jpg[/img] [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/ztj04p.jpg[/img] [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/687i85.jpg[/img] [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/29p7v9s.jpg[/img] [img]http://i52.tinypic.com/2ecjl89.jpg[/img] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/33u5v68.jpg[/img] [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/ws9yqs.jpg[/img] [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/521kw.jpg[/img] [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/6oeiqt.jpg[/img] [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/4j7w1s.jpg[/img][/center]

[center]REP+ is Appreciated
[size=36pt]RELEASING SOON 9.5 !~!~!~!~!~!~!~!~!~!~!~!~
[/size]
Well i do realise many people have been recommending the MTP version of PI Base there fore ii am releasing my source based on MTP with modifications to it. Hope to see this get released soon.

[center][size=16pt]ShadowX![/size][/center]
[center][size=14pt]The Ultimate Gaming Experience.[/size][/center]

Download Source

Perfect Hybridding!
Good ingame Graphics! All monsters fully animated!
All Special Attacks Coded!
